sentences.en: Because of its trace amount in the nature, it is always prepared by bio - mimetic synthesis methods.
sentences.cn: 昆布氨酸是昆布中一种具有降压活性的 非 蛋白质氨基酸,在昆布中的含量极少,一般采用仿生合成的方法制得.

sentences.en: Both realism and naturalism are mimetic systems or practices of representation.
sentences.cn: 现实主义和自然主义都是一种模仿体系或表现性的做法。

sentences.en: Onomatopoeia and mimetic words are a striking feature of Japanese vocabulary.
sentences.cn: 摘要拟声词和拟态词是日语词汇的突出特征.

sentences.en: The word biomimic comes from bio, as in biology and mimetic, which means to copy.
sentences.cn: 仿生学是由[仿]模仿、或是复制, [生]也就是生物两个字组合而成.

words.tran_cn: 效颦者，模仿者；仿制品；小丑
模仿，模拟；（动物等）拟态伪装
模仿的；[晶体]拟态的；类似的

trans.tran_en: copying the movements or appearance of someone or something else
